messages.subject: Hijikata's Birthplace photo in SHQ Photos-- Locations!
messages.msgSnippet: Posted a pic of the site where the house that Hijikata was born in once stood, as well as a pic of the leaves used in the Ishida powder (under Files --
messages.messageBody:
Posted a pic of the site where the house that Hijikata was born in once
stood, as well as a pic of the leaves used in the Ishida powder (under
"Files"-- "Artifacts"). Woohoo!!

--M.
